sentences.english: Sometime they can be pessimistic which is caused by their dualistic nature.
sentences.chinese: 由於具雙重性格，有時候他們可能會悲觀厭世。

sentences.english: Kato told police he was "tired of living" and simply wanted to kill.
sentences.chinese: 智大告訴警方他已“厭世”，只不過想到了殺人。

sentences.english: I have been a complete misanthrope, I hate humans.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在一個完整的厭世者，我討厭人類。

sentences.english: This may imply world-weariness or a no-bullshit attitude.
sentences.chinese: 這可以暗示一種厭世的或者“少跟我裝蒜”的態度。

sentences.english: I also have a world-weary plot.
sentences.chinese: 我也有一個厭世的陰謀。

sentences.english: 'I'm really very pessimistic these days, ' he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“最近我真的非常悲觀厭世。”

sentences.english: A singular sort of misanthropy possessed him.
sentences.chinese: 他的內心有了一種怪異的厭世情緒。

sentences.english: This childhood led me to a life of misanthropy;
sentences.chinese: 童年的陰影使我成爲了一個厭世主義者。

sentences.english: Did it motivate or demotivate you?
sentences.chinese: 那將激勵你奮發圖強還是讓你變得消極厭世呢？

sentences.english: Sometime they can be pessimistic which is caused by their dual nature.
sentences.chinese: 由於具雙重性格，有時候他們可能悲觀厭世。

definition: elated/light and airy feeling (after a few drinks)/smug and conceited/complacent
less capable than desirable (idiom); not as strong as one would wish/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
